text: @CNN @andersoncooper Coop the world expects your genius to focus on WHY didn’t Adam Schiff’s Intel Committee anticipate and warn us of Coronavirus?  We expect you to call him to account for putting us at risk.  We expect you to demand his resignation for his failure.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Anderson Cooper 360
entity.description: Anderson Cooper goes beyond the headlines with in-depth reporting and investigations. Through nightly "Keeping Them Honest" reports, Anderson keeps his commitment to holding those in power accountable. And, of course, there's the RidicuList, a tongue-in-cheek commentary on the day's news that may leave viewers (and Anderson) laughing. Joining him are guests that frequently include political and legal analysts.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
